resources.string: The best six doctors anywhere and no one can deny it are sunshine, water, rest, air, exercise and diet.
No matter how much it gets abused, the body can restore balance. The first rule is to stop interfering with nature.
There is no one giant step that does it. Itâ€™s a lot of little steps.
I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health.
Health is a state of body. Wellness is a state of being.
